containerVersion.description: Adds non-functional informational tags to the "01 material unique to this website" and "02 third-party additions" folders, both to provide information about the purpose of these folders and to ensure that these folders will be included in the JSON export file. Empty folders will not export.

tag.name: rollup02 - GA4
tag.notes: This variable stores the Google Analytics 4 Measurement ID of the second roll-up property intended for use with the website on which this container is deployed.

tag.name: local - GA4
tag.notes: This configuration stores the Google Analytics 4 Measurement ID intended for use with the website on which this container is deployed.

tag.name: debug - output container info to console

parameter.value:
<script>
  console.log("Mason Template Container Version: {{Mason GTM Container Version}}");
  console.log("GTM Container ID: {{Container ID}}");
  console.log("Hostname: {{Hostname - local}}");
  console.log("UAID-Local: {{UAID - local}}");
  console.log("UAID-Roll-Up 01: {{UAID - rollup01}}");
  console.log("UAID-Roll-Up 02: {{UAID - rollup02}}");
  console.log("GA4 Measurement ID - Local: {{GA4 measurement ID - local}}");
  console.log("GA4 Measurement ID - Roll-Up 01: {{GA4 measurement ID - rollup01}}");
  console.log("GA4 Measurement ID - Roll-Up 02: {{GA4 measurement ID - rollup02}}");  
</script>

tag.name: rollup01 - GA4
tag.notes: This variable stores the Google Analytics 4 Measurement ID of the first roll-up property intended for use with the website on which this container is deployed.

parameter.value:
<script type="text/javascript">
/*
                    .ooooo.          ooo. .oo.     .ooooo.    oooo d8b
                   d88" `88b         `888P"Y88b   d88" `88b   `888""8P
                   888888888  88888   888   888   888   888    888
                   888        88888   888   888   888   888    888       
                   `"88888"          o888o o888o  `Y8bod8P"   d888b      

********************************************************************************
Copyright 2014 by E-Nor Inc.
Author Mohamed Adel
Automatically tag youtube videos for Google Tag Manager to Play / Pause / Watch to End / Progress. 
Version: 5.1 : Enhanced
Last Updated: 06/19/2015
********************************************************************************/

var tag = document.createElement('script');
tag.src = document.location.protocol + "//www.youtube.com/iframe_api";
var firstScriptTag = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
firstScriptTag.parentNode.insertBefore(tag, firstScriptTag);
var videoArray = new Array();
var playerArray = new Array();
var Settings_HitType = "gtm" // This setup can handle classic/gtm/universal

function _sendYouTubeProgressEvent(videoTitle, percentage, hittype) {
    if (hittype == 'classic') {
        _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'video', '' + percentage + '%', videoTitle, percentage]);
    } else if (hittype == 'universal') {
        ga('send', 'event', 'video', + percentage + '%', videoTitle, percentage);
    } else if (hittype == 'gtm') {
        dataLayer.push({
            'event': 'eventTracker',
            'eventCat': 'video',
            'eventAct': '' + percentage + '%',
            'eventLbl': videoTitle,
            'eventVal': percentage
        });
    }
}

(function(jQuery) {
    function trackYouTube() {
        var i = 0;
        jQuery('iframe').each(function() {
            var video = jQuery(this);
            var _thisSrc = this.src;
            if (IsYouTube(_thisSrc)) {
                this.src = YTUrlHandler(_thisSrc);
                var youtubeid = youtube_parser(_thisSrc);
                videoArray[i] = youtubeid;
                this.setAttribute('id', youtubeid);
                i++;
            }

        });
    }
    jQuery(document).ready(function() {
        trackYouTube();
    });
})(jQuery);

function onYouTubeIframeAPIReady() {
    for (var i = 0; i < videoArray.length; i++) {
        playerArray[i] = new YT.Player(videoArray[i], {
            events: {
                'onReady': onPlayerReady,
                'onStateChange': onPlayerStateChange
            }
        });
    }
}




function onPlayerReady(event) {}
cCi = 1;
function onPlayerStateChange(event) {

    var videotitle = event.target.getVideoData().title;
    var played_percentage = 0;
    var vidId =  event.target.getVideoData().video_id;
    var videoIndex = 0;
    for (var o=0; o < videoArray.length; o++)
    {
        if (videoArray[o]==vidId){videoIndex=o;}
        }
    played_percentage  = ((parseInt(event.target.getCurrentTime()) / parseInt(event.target.getDuration())) * 100).toFixed();
    if (event.data == YT.PlayerState.PLAYING && played_percentage==0){
        
        eval("(function() {  " +
            "var flag_" + cCi + "_25 = false;" +
            "var flag_" + cCi + "_50 = false;" +
            "var flag_" + cCi + "_75 = false;" +
            "var flag_" + cCi + "_95 = false;" +
            "function xx" + cCi + "(vindx){ " +
            "var percentage = ((parseInt(playerArray[vindx].getCurrentTime()) / parseInt(playerArray[vindx].getDuration())) * 100).toFixed();" +
            "var videotitle = playerArray[vindx].getVideoData().title; " +
            "if (percentage < 100) { " +
            "if (percentage > 25 && percentage <= 50 && flag_" + cCi + "_25 == false) { _sendYouTubeProgressEvent(videotitle,25,Settings_HitType); flag_" + cCi + "_25=true; }" +
            "if (percentage > 50 && percentage <= 75 && flag_" + cCi + "_50 == false) {_sendYouTubeProgressEvent(videotitle,50,Settings_HitType);flag_" + cCi + "_50=true;}" +
            "if (percentage > 75 && percentage <= 95 && flag_" + cCi + "_75 == false) {_sendYouTubeProgressEvent(videotitle,75,Settings_HitType);flag_" + cCi + "_75=true;}" +
            "if (percentage > 95 && flag_" + cCi + "_95 == false) {_sendYouTubeProgressEvent(videotitle,95,Settings_HitType);flag_" + cCi + "_95=true;}" +
            "}" +
            " }" +
            "setInterval(function(){  xx" + cCi + "("+videoIndex+"); }, parseInt("+event.target.getDuration()+")/10); " +
            "})();");
        cCi++;
    }




    if (event.data == YT.PlayerState.PLAYING) {
        if (Settings_HitType == 'classic') {
            _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'video', 'play', videotitle, 0]);
        } else if (Settings_HitType == 'universal') {
            ga('send', 'event', 'video', 'play', videotitle);
        } else if (Settings_HitType == 'gtm') {
            dataLayer.push({
                'event': 'eventTracker',
                'eventCat': 'video',
                'eventAct': 'play',
                'eventLbl': videotitle,
                'eventVal': 0
            });
        }



    }
    if (event.data == YT.PlayerState.ENDED) {
        if (Settings_HitType == 'classic') {
            _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'video', 'complete', videotitle, 100]);
        } else if (Settings_HitType == 'universal') {
            ga('send', 'event', 'video', 'complete', videotitle, 100);
        } else if (Settings_HitType == 'gtm') {
            dataLayer.push({
                'event': 'eventTracker',
                'eventCat': 'video',
                'eventAct': 'complete',
                'eventLbl': videotitle,
                'eventVal': 100
            });
        }
    }
    if (event.data == YT.PlayerState.PAUSED) {
        if (Settings_HitType == 'classic') {
            _gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'video', 'pause', videotitle, 0]);
        } else if (Settings_HitType == 'universal') {
            ga('send', 'event', 'video', 'pause', videotitle, 0);
        } else if (Settings_HitType == 'gtm') {
            dataLayer.push({
                'event': 'eventTracker',
                'eventCat': 'video',
                'eventAct': 'pause',
                'eventLbl': videotitle,
                'eventVal': 0
            });
        }


    }


}

function youtube_parser(url) {
    var regExp = /^.*(youtu.be\/|v\/|u\/\w\/|embed\/|watch\?v=|\&v=)([^#\&\?]*).*/;
    var match = url.match(regExp);
    if (match && match[2].length == 11) {
        return match[2];
    } else {
        //error
    }
}



function IsYouTube(url) {
    var YouTubeLink_regEx = /^.*((youtu.be\/)|(v\/)|(\/u\/\w\/)|(embed\/)|(watch\?))\??v?=?([^#\&\?]*).*/;
    var match = url.match(YouTubeLink_regEx);
    if (match != null && match.length > 0) {
        return true;
    } else {
        return false;
    }
}

function YTUrlHandler(url) {
    url = url.replace(/origin\=(https?:\/\/)?([\da-z\.-]+)\.([a-z\.]{2,6})\&?/ig, 'origin=' + document.location.protocol + '//' + document.location.host);

    stAdd = '';
    adFlag = false;
    if (url.indexOf('https') == -1) {
        url = url.replace('http', 'https');
    }
    if (url.indexOf('?') == -1) {
        stAdd = '?flag=1';
    }
    if (url.indexOf('enablejsapi') == -1) {
        stAdd += '&enablejsapi=1';
        adFlag = true;
    }
    if (url.indexOf('origin') == -1) {
        stAdd += '&origin=' + document.location.protocol + '//' + document.location.host;
        adFlag = true;
    }


    if (adFlag == true) {
        return url + stAdd;
    } else {
        return url;
    }

}
    
</script>

tag.name: 01 material unique to this website folder info

parameter.value:
<!--
This folder is used to keep track of site-specific customizations to the Mason standard GTM container.

This tag is included here both to provide information about the purpose of this folder and to ensure that this folder will be included in the JSON export file. Empty folders will not export.
-->

<!--
This folder is used to keep track of marketing tags and/or other customizations made to this container by third-parties (outside marketing firms, etc.).
Any third-party additions to this container should be placed in this folder and prefixed with the name or abbreviation of the third-party.

This tag is included here both to provide information about the purpose of this folder and to ensure that this folder will be included in the JSON export file. Empty folders will not export.
-->

trigger.name: link click - rollup02 UAID invalid
trigger.notes:
This trigger fires on link clicks and checks whether the UAID - rollup02 variable is a valid GA property ID.
This trigger is used as a exception to prevent tags from sending data to rollup02 if the property ID is not valid.
This trigger is enabled on all pages. Since no tags depend on this trigger to send data, it doesn't matter if it fires on the 'wrong' pages.

trigger.name: page view - rollup01 UAID invalid
trigger.notes:
This trigger fires on pages views and checks whether the UAID - rollup01 variable is a valid GA property ID.
This trigger is used as a exception to prevent tags from sending data to rollup01 if the property ID is not valid.
This trigger is enabled on all pages. Since no tags depend on this trigger to send data, it doesn't matter if it fires on the 'wrong' pages.

variable.name: UAID - rollup01
variable.notes: This variable stores the Google Analytics Property ID of the first roll-up property intended for use with the website on which this container is deployed.

variable.name: UAID - rollup02
variable.notes: This variable stores the Google Analytics Property ID of the second roll-up property intended for use with the website on which this container is deployed.

variable.name: Hostname - local
variable.notes: This variable stores the hostname intended for use with this container. If this container is used on a different hostname, the tags will not fire. This must be modified when using this container on a different hostname.

variable.name: UAID - local
variable.notes: This variable stores the Google Analytics Property ID intended for use with the website on which this container is deployed.
